ygData.subject: Re: 8th level pet
ygData.msgSnippet: I strongly advise you do not try using dark elf illusions in high hold for 2 reasons.... 1.  Your probably only L8 and wont see it for another 4 levels 2.  The
ygData.messageBody:
I strongly advise you do not try using dark elf illusions in high hold for 2
reasons....

1. Your probably only L8 and wont see it for another 4 levels
2. The guards kill dark elves on sight I believe, and they are much worse
than the orcs.

You were the victim of bad luck, i have made the trip with several L8
characters (and a L4 one once before the animations were added locally)and
have never had an orc see through my invisibility. I have had it wear off,
but was able to run to the guards and survive.

-----Original Message-----
From: tri-mix@... [mailto:tri-mix@...]
Sent: Saturday, May 08, 1999 9:41 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] 8th level pet


From: tri-mix@... (Ronnie G. Free II)

Rival,
I am sorry to hear that you ran into trouble.. But I must admit that I have
never found an Orc that can see invisible ( I may be wrong, its just that I
have never ran into one). What server are you on? I am on the Rathe Server
and would be happy to assist you in obtaining your Animation. Here is
another Thought for you also: You may want to use the Dark Elf illusion,
the Orcs in CrushBone do not attack me when I am using the DE illusion so
perhaps the Orcs in Highpass will not either.. But I would still use
INVIS..

Narcos
Lvl 16 Enchanter (if I can keep from dying haha)
The Rathe
